Privacy Policy

Pages on this domain and eicoop.netlify.app use goatcounter.com for privacy-friendly analytics. Basic information about your visit and your browser is recorded to gauge interest and guide development. No personal information is recorded, no fingerprinting is performed, and recorded data are only available to the author as aggregate statistics. You can "opt out" of analytics by blocking the gc.zgo.at domain with a content blocker, e.g. uBlock Origin, but as a very privacy-conscious person myself, I don't believe that's warranted.

For tools that may include confidential information directly in URLs, e.g. the CoopTracker with coop codes, since the URL you directly land on (but not the ones you later navigate to) is collected by the analytics service, the confidential information may leak into analytics logs, and leaked data could be accessed with some effort. In that case, I will not disclose the information without a compelling reason (haven't found one to date) and without confirming it is already public or having express permission. Also rest assured that I have zero interest in joining or even checking your coop, really.

Tools that ask for input like your player ID or coop code in order to display personalized information communicate with Egg, Inc.'s server through an intermediary due to browser restrictions preventing direct connectivity. The intermediary is a Cloudflare Workers domain under the author's control: wasmegg.zw.workers.dev. Confidential information used in communications through this domain is not logged.
